## Application.logger property

Logger service.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly logger: Logger;
```

## Remarks

The logger service is different in that it is always available on the application, even before it is initialized. If not explicitely configured, [DefaultLogger](./common.defaultlogger.md) is used. If explicitely configured, the default logger is used before the configured logger service is initialized and after it is shut down.

The default logger format string is taken from `X2_LOG_FORMAT` environment variable. If not provided, "<!-- -->{<!-- -->ts<!-- -->} {<!-- -->?ctx<!-- -->} {<!-- -->cat<!-- -->}<!-- -->: {<!-- -->msg<!-- -->}<!-- -->\\<!-- -->n<!-- -->{<!-- -->?err<!-- -->}<!-- -->" is used by default.
